name: Pong by Ent. Inc.
description:
This is is a prototype I managed to restore from some test machine that I've got recently, part of an EntOS and basically just a test build for a game from this system.

Managed to fix most of it, yet there's still broken graphics, since — EntOS used it's own special hardware for rendering and well, it's long time gone.

Changes:

Edited executable - ESC to exit, since original wasn't even meant to be stop.

W-S for left pad; Arrows Up-Down for right pad;

Other:

Still working about getting at least some version of EntOS, will post it ASAP, thanks for the patience guys.
